description.value: Talent taken at Character Creation. Character is a veteran of The Long War. They gain +10 to Fellowship Tests and Fellowship-Based Skill Tests when dealing with NPC's who would care about The Long War (Heretics, Renegades, Chaos Space Marines, etc). Chaos Space Marine Minions of the character gain +10 Loyalty. Legion Weapons are one step easier to obtain (Rare-->Scarce, etc). Veterans of The Long War are despised by the Imperium and the Astartes.
